#summary Topsy - Otter API Request Format

= API Request Format =

All requests are implemented via HTTP GET calls.

== Syntax: ==

{{{
GET /resource.response-format?query=params HTTP/1.1
Host: otter.topsy.com
}}}

The portion of the request url labeled `resource` should be one of the [Resources] available from the API. The portion of the request url labeled `response-format` should be one of the [ResponseFormats], either `json` or `js`. All query parameters for the resource should be provided in via query parameters.
